t: Issue with "Me Too" Product Application on Amazon USA ...
s: 'Your Account does not qualify' usually means the Brand is gated or Amazon is not accepting applications at this time. 'Me Too' sells directly on Amazon with its own Amazon Store. It's likely that they don't want anyone competing against them.

I am a new seller and as far as I understand, I already got permission from Amazon to sell this product while creating a Me Too listing, even the brand didn't impose any restrictions at that time so why is it happening now? It has put my account's health at risk now.

June 18, 2021 - Topic: Me too listing What is me too listing? Me too listing means that the product is already listed on Amazon under the brand, then Amazon does not allow us to create a new listing of that product. In this case, Amazon asks us at which price you sell the same product under the same brand name.
